name: Lernerfolg Vorschule: Prinzessin Lillifee
overview: Even little princesses have to exchange the fairy wand for a pen and go to school. Luckily, Princess Lillifee and all her friends are helping preschoolers prepare for elementary school in a fun way. Learning numbers and letters, basic arithmetic and reading, even the first English terms are taught to the players in the most beautiful places in Princess Lillifee's palace garden. And practice pays off: the more the player gets right, the more levels and bonus games she unlocks. Features: Learning the first letters and numbers together with Princess Lillifee, Pupsi & Company Thanks to voice output, no reading skills are required Train memory and logical thinking For all preschoolers from 4 years Motivating atmosphere Varied forms of exercises
